lines.text:
[just out of hyperspace]
So... how long was I under?
Back home your son is older than you are!
I hope he turned out better than me.
They switch you off when life is good then switch you on when they're up to their noses in life's bitter droppings!
You said it, tin man.
You know what? It looks like you could really use the steam bath!
Well, I had a hard night.
So fair's fair. Get naked.
I hear you're the biggest trouble shooter in this part of the galaxy.
That's what they tell me.
How'd you like to see some... trouble?
Let's go bag ourselves a Dingwhopper!

[In the decompression chamber]
He got the bends. They found him out there eating the sand. He thought it was sugar.
Welcome to the Garden of Eden. We play God here.
[first lines]
[Colby is awaken from his hibernation by his android pilot SAM-104]
Where are we?
Beta zone. There's a pack of food raiders on our tail, sir.
My hands... are numb.
Concentrate sir, they're closing in!
We don't get many new faces around here.
That's what I like about my job. I'm always the new face.
You know what I want to know? What you two were doing in there dressed like that!

[jealous]
Explaining your scars, no doubt!
